caption.p: Location of Lake Ohrid in the Western Balkans ( A), morphology and bathymetry of the Ohrid Basin and position of study site Co1202, the ICDP coring site DEEP and core JO2004-1ï»¿ ( B) and high-resolution bathymetry of the terrace system in Ohrid Bay ( C). Plates A-C were generated using Generic Mapping Tools (GMT 5.2.1; http://gmt.soest.hawaii.edu), Global Mapper ( http://www.bluemarblegeo.com) and Fledermaus 7.0 ( http://www.qps.nl), respectively.
